description:
######Version 1.2.0. Added backup feature, now you can take send logs to your email and fixed the problems in reports.######

ABOUT
•	Tracking your weight  helps you and your doctor to control obesity and its many health related issues.
•	The Weight Tracker simplifies weight data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple weight readings at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the Weight reading, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a voluble tool for weight value longitudinal trends analysis using graphs.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.

  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes of weight over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
